function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of integrated planning at national level","Impact":"Increased pressure on protected conservation areas (PCAs)","Mitigation":"Implementation of cohesive national development strategies that recognize the importance of biodiversity and ecosystem services","Technologies":"Integrated planning tools and software for biodiversity and ecosystem management","People":"Conservation organizations, government agencies, and policymakers","Owner":"Government agencies and policymakers"},{"Description":"Relaxation of regulations increasing pressure on PCAs","Impact":"Increased threats to biodiversity and ecosystem services","Mitigation":"Exclusion of any relaxation of regulations in stimulus packages","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring and enforcement technologies","People":"Conservation organizations, government agencies, and policymakers","Owner":"Government agencies and policymakers"},{"Description":"Lack of funding security for PCAs","Impact":"Inability to manage pressures on PCAs effectively","Mitigation":"Implementation of fiscal earmarking to secure and channel public sector funds for PCAs","Technologies":"Financial management software for earmarking and tracking funds","People":"Conservation organizations, government agencies, and policymakers","Owner":"Government agencies and policymakers"}]}
